column2: With the help of my co-conspirators, it is a simple enough matter to make a few minor but important alterations to official records to make it appear as if [TopLiege.GetBestName]'s empire should be mine.
Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen...

Though my co-conspirators did their best to assist, my attempt to alter official records so that it would appear as if the Mandate of Heaven belonged to me rather than [TopLiege.GetBestName] has failed. Even worse, my plan was discovered.
I need to look to my defenses...

I have just received word that [From.GetBestName] has attempted to alter various official records to try to claim the Mandate of Heaven and my imperial title. The attempt was discovered by a loyal bureaucrat, however.
